mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k2_shop_member( shopMemberId, businessLevelCode, shopMemberPw, shopMemberName, shopMemberAddr, shopMemberEmail, shopMemberPhone, shopMemberState, shopWithdrawalReason, shopWithdrawalDate, shopMemberReg )VALUES( #{shopMemberId}, #{businessLevelCode}, #{shopMemberPw}, #{shopMemberName}, #{shopMemberAddr}, #{shopMemberEmail}, #{shopMemberPhone}, #{shopMemberState}, #{shopWithdrawalReason}, #{shopWithdrawalDate}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT shopMemberId, businessLevelCode, shopMemberName, shopMemberAddr, shopMemberEmail, shopMemberPhone, shopMemberState, shopWithdrawalReason, shopWithdrawalDate, shopMemberReg FROM k2_shop_member

SELECT shopMemberId, businessLevelCode, shopMemberPw, shopMemberName, shopMemberAddr, shopMemberEmail, shopMemberPhone, shopMemberState, shopWithdrawalReason, shopWithdrawalDate, shopMemberReg FROM k2_shop_member WHERE shopMemberId = #{shopMemberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE k2_shop_member SET shopMemberName = #{shopMemberName}, shopMemberAddr = #{shopMemberAddr}, shopMemberEmail = #{shopMemberEmail}, shopMemberPhone = #{shopMemberPhone} WHERE shopMemberId = #{shopMemberId}
